definition: clearly or sharply defined to the mind, to remove all the trees at one time
details:
adjective
- clearly or sharply defined to the mind
= example: clearly or sharply defined to the mind
= synonyms: distinct, trenchant
- clear and distinct to the senses
= synonyms: clear
- having had all the trees removed at one time
= example: having had all the trees removed at one time
verb
- to remove all the trees at one time
= example: to remove all the trees at one time
